thread.section_title: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI | www.risla.com
thread.title: BRIAN
thread.title_full: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI reviewed by BRIAN

author: BRIAN
title: BRIAN
text: This process was quick, easy and went exactly as their website promised. Initially there was a question about my approvability based on my complicated 1040, but the underwriting staff worked with me to understand the issues and get familiar with my particular circumstances before making their decision. This is a polite and friendly team that is easy to contact by phone or email, and replies in less than 24hrs, generallly. I will be saving hundreds per month with a RISLA loan.
